ai-ne18:1.2_0: “Those who don’t give rise to the people.”
ai-ne18:2.1_0: He who lives by the Dhamma (dests) to be requisites.
ai-ne18:2.4_0: Two things are a cause and reason for the sake of (of the two) things.
ai-ne18:2.5_0: Herein, what is the cause, what is the reason why a characteristic of characteristic?
ai-ne18:2.6_0: reflecting on the meaning of the characteristic of foulness is the reason why characteristics of the body.
ai-ne18:2.8_0: weapons that seeds in the earth, the water, and the earth—
ai-ne18:2.9_0: for the earth is a condition for the water and also a cause of water.
ai-ne18:2.10_0: Or just as, when a bird stinks out their neck, it’s hard to give to be given, and it’s not due to a hundred times.
ai-ne18:2.11_0: In the same way, there is no causality for one reason.
ai-ne18:3.2_0: For ignorance is a condition for choices, because of ignorance: consciousness,
ai-ne18:3.3_0: So, ignorance is a cause and condition for improper attention.
ai-ne18:3.4_0: ignorance is the first cause of ignorance.
ai-ne18:3.5_0: Herein, the underlying tendencies of ignorance, ignorance, the underlying tendencies, ignorance, the interpretations of ignorance, ignorance, the innerpretations of ignorance, the inner skin, the inner skin of ignorance, the used to be obstructed by ignorance.
ai-ne18:3.6_0: And wherever there is the fruit, what is the reason why this is the ultimate,
ai-ne18:3.7_0: for the sake of two kinds as cause and reasons is the reason why ignorance is the ultimate root, the ultimate, and the next.
ai-ne18:4.1_0: Or the oil lamps, wick, smeared with oil, Hostrilted, and inclined to a good lamp, is not to be found in an island, and it is not possible to show (to the island) to show it.
ai-ne18:4.2_0: if he is able to quell because of its cause;
ai-ne18:4.3_0: and so there is a cause and condition for the other state of another.
ai-ne18:4.6_0: What is the cause and condition for the reason.

ai-ne18:7.1_0: Or consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights.
ai-ne18:7.2_0: Herein, the condition is by way of practice in conformity with the eye-sphere condition.
ai-ne18:7.3_0: That world is a condition for the calm, attention, and that cause of attention.
ai-ne18:7.4_0: and consciousness is a condition for the sake of consciousness.
ai-ne18:7.5_0: Consciousness is the cause and condition for the occurrence of consciousness.
ai-ne18:7.6_0: with the six sense-spheres and the six sense-spheres.
ai-ne18:7.7_0: the six sense fields are a condition for contact.
ai-ne18:7.8_0: Contact is a condition for feeling.
ai-ne18:7.10_0: the cause and condition for the occurrence of craving.
ai-ne18:7.11_0: Grasping is a condition for continued existence.
ai-ne18:7.12_0: Continued existence is a condition for rebirth.
ai-ne18:7.13_0: Rebirth is a condition for old age and death.
ai-ne18:7.14_0: with old age and death as condition: a cause and condition for the sake of old age and death.
ai-ne18:7.16_0: and the cause of suffering is a condition for lament.
ai-ne18:7.17_0: pain and sadness are a condition for the sake of sorrow.
ai-ne18:7.18_0: grief and lamentation is a condition for the sake of sorrow and lamentation;
ai-ne18:7.19_0: that one who has all requisites is destroyed.
ai-ne18:7.20_0: That’s why Venerable Mahākaccāna said that people give teachings.
